SuperStatBar - Class in Unnamed Package
New and Improved Stat Bar (Formerly Health Bar).
SuperStatBar() - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
Main constructor - A basic constructor that sets default values.
SuperStatBar(int[], int[], Actor, int, int, int, Color[], Color[], boolean, Color, int) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
The king of all StatBar constuctors! Takes details for an array of bars, otherwise the same as above.
SuperStatBar(int, int, Actor, int, int, int) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
A simple constructor for a somewhat customized Green and Red stat bar.
SuperStatBar(int, int, Actor, int, int, int, Color, Color) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
Similar to above, but with the ability to customize colors
SuperStatBar(int, int, Actor, int, int, int, Color, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
Similar to above, but with the ability to have the bar hide when full - for example if you don't want full health bars shown.
SuperStatBar(int, int, Actor, int, int, int, Color, Color, boolean, Color, int) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
The most detailed constructor! Can specify a border including thickness and color.
SuperStatBar(int, Actor) - Constructor for class SuperStatBar
A simple constructor - specify a single value (which will be treated as both current and max for the stat) as well as an owner to follow.
